text: Carolina Santos, born Carolina Ribeiro de Almeida in 1986 in Alhos Vedros, is a Portuguese legal adviser, model and television actress. Since June 2016, she became the Portuguese "Trivago Guy". == References == Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:People from Moita Category:Portuguese female models Category:Portuguese television actresses Category:21st-century Portuguese actresses
title: Carolina Santos
